description: A React functional component named ConfirmDialog that provides a modal dialog for user confirmation actions, such as deletions. It renders a modal with a title, description, and confirmation/cancellation buttons.

methods.name: ConfirmDialog({ isOpen, title, description, confirmText, onConfirm, onCancel })
methods.description: React functional component rendering a confirmation dialog with customizable text and callback handlers.
